```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(brms)
library(rethinking)

```


```{r}
d <- read.csv("data/lejemaal.csv")

```

```{r}

d <- d[is.finite(d$net_price_per_sqm), ]
d <- d[is.finite(d$area), ]
d$postal_code <- as.factor(d$postal_code)
d$city <- as.factor(d$city)

```


```{r}


model <- lm(net_price_per_sqm ~ area + deposit + city, d)

summary(model)


```
